Package com.guardsquare.dexguard.rasp.inject

Class RuntimeWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guardsquare.dexguard.rasp.inject.RuntimeWrapper
  • public class RuntimeWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper around the runtime library, to cache results. TODO(#1545): To be removed.
